name: Pocket Avenger
description:
Load up your guns, hit the road and do what you have to in order to survive, keep moving as fast as you can, and protect people by any means necessary. When the Dead are rising, RUN!

FEATURES:

. Intense runner gameplay with stunning visuals depicting a grim zombie apocalypse
. Over 200 very very challenging levels with awesome boss battles.
. Battle with other players in Weekly Tournament. LIVE!
. Team up with your friends to defeat Boss. LIVE!
. Choose from a broad range of weapons; from pistols to new and improved laser weapons & shotguns or even powerups.

PLEASE NOTE:

Pocket Avenger contents some in-game items such as extra lives or foods will require payment. You can turn-off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.
